EmailTemplate.textOnly:
30 minutes. 1 hour. 1 day. 1 week.
{{Lead.First Name:default=MVP}}:
Deploy a free 30-day trial of VMTurbo Operations Manager <http://bit.ly/1jxCL8D> side-by-side with any other virtualization management platform on the planet. We guarantee VMTurbo will win out. You'll observe an 80% decrease in tickets from virtual operations issues.
As one of our smartest customers once said, "For the time it takes to install VMTurbo, how can you afford not to look at it?"
You won't believe what we can do in: 30 minutes. 1 hour. 1 day. 1 week.
Show {{company.company name:default=your company}} why they hired you in the first place. Click below to learn more. <http://bit.ly/1jxCL8D>
You can't afford not to look, VMTurbo
